report.name: amtlisps

dataSource.name: Q_MUEAMTL2
dataSource.select:
--------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Query Etat MUEAMTL2 -- Alimentation cpte immo. en cours ,types T1/projet spécial M -- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY') As dc_ancouran, TO_CHAR(bex.moismens,'MM/YYYY') AS dc_datder_mens, bip.pid AS dc_pid, SUBSTR(bip.pnom, 1, 24) AS dc_pnom, ------------- Statut et Date du statut ------------------------------------ DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, LAST_DAY(bex.moismens)), bip.adatestatut, bip.astatut, ' ' ) AS dc_statut, DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, LAST_DAY(bex.moismens)), bip.adatestatut, TO_CHAR(bip.adatestatut, 'MM/YYYY'), NULL ) AS dc_adatestatut, ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 4, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins4, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 3, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins3, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 2, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins2, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins1, ------------- Montants HT année en cours --------------------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_ancour(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_cour FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Remplacement des tests sur types et cpdspe par clause -- where paramétrée (Pphilippe DARRACQ le 26/02/2001) --------------------------------------------------------------- &p_where -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' -- LE CONTROLE DU TOP IMMO EST MIS EN COMMENTAIRE POUR LES TESTS UNIQUEMENT -- A ENLEVER PLUS TARD ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table histo_amort -- Ne prendre que les lignes BIP ayant aprojbip dans histo_amort -------------------------------------------------------------- AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) ORDER BY bip.pid ;

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , LAST_DAY ( bex.moismens ) ) , bip.adatestatut , bip.astatut , ' ' )
DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , LAST_DAY ( bex.moismens ) ) , bip.adatestatut , TO_CHAR ( bip.adatestatut , 'MM/YYYY' ) , NULL )

dataSource.name: Q_AMTLISMU
dataSource.select:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Query Etat MUEAMTL2 -- Alimentation cpte immo. en cours , -- années antérieures --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY') As dc_ancouran1, TO_CHAR(bex.moismens, 'MM/YYYY') AS dc_datder_mens, bip.pid AS dc_pid, SUBSTR(bip.pnom, 1, 24) AS dc_pnom, ------------- Statut et Date du statut ------------------------------------ DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, LAST_DAY(bex.moismens) ), bip.adatestatut, bip.astatut, ' ' ) AS dc_statut, DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, LAST_DAY(bex.moismens) ), bip.adatestatut, TO_CHAR(bip.adatestatut, 'MM/YYYY'), NULL ) AS dc_adatestatut, ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 9, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins9, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 8, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins8, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 7, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins7, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 6, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins6, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 5, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins5, ------------- Montants HT année en cours --------------------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_ancour(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_cour FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 &p_where -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' -- LE CONTROLE DU TOP IMMO EST MIS EN COMMENTAIRE POUR LES TESTS UNIQUEMENT -- A ENLEVER PLUS TARD ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table histo_amort -- Ne prendre que les lignes BIP ayant aprojbip dans histo_amort -------------------------------------------------------------- AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid) ORDER BY bip.pid ;

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , LAST_DAY ( bex.moismens ) ) , bip.adatestatut , bip.astatut , ' ' )
DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , LAST_DAY ( bex.moismens ) ) , bip.adatestatut , TO_CHAR ( bip.adatestatut , 'MM/YYYY' ) , NULL )

textSegment.string: --- ALIMENTATION DU COMPTE IMMOBILISATION EN COURS ---
--- ALIMENTATION DU COMPTE IMMOBILISATION EN COURS ---
